headline: Simon Property Group (SPG) Announces New Leadership Roles Including COO Promotion
summary: Simon Property Group (SPG) recently announced key executive changes, with Eli Simon promoted to Chief Operating Officer and Jonathan Murphy and Eric Sadi appointed as Co-Presidents for North American Real Estate. These leadership shifts occurred amidst broader market gains, as major indexes, including the Dow Jones and S&P 500, rose over 1%, with Nasdaq up nearly 3% last week. Despite SPG's price moving by 1.94% during the last quarter, market trends seemed to dominate overall movements. The...

headline: What Baron Bought And Sold In Q2: Airbnb, BXP, And More
summary: Baron Capital reveals Q2 real estate moves, spotlighting Airbnb and BXP. See what changed, why it matters, and how investors can benefit from the insights.
